name: Simon Sears
about: Excellent variety. I would recommend this for anyone who wants to try a perfume without breaking the bank or being stuck with a scent that you cannot stand. You can spray the card and let the scent dry down to get a true scent experience.

name: Helena Calhoun
about: Great perfume samples! The perfect amount to store in my purse for work, a special date, etc. I love that in addition to the samples, the seller threw in an extra perfume to try out.

name: Mueller Figueroa
about: All in all, this is a good product. The fragrances are nice and I have found a few favorites. My mom loved it so much when I showed it to her, she had to get one for herself.

name: Howe Cotton
about: I use this brands perfume daily. Thay have very unique collection. Their fragrance is also long lasting. They also have some of the coolest bootle design.

name: Morgan Bowers
about: The perfumes came in with cardboard covers the labels on everyone and a free sample! Plus extra perfumes! Iâ€™m very pleased and I highly recommend this product!

name: Mabel Head
about: Although the samples a fairly small, I like trying them out. But wow is it expensive now. So I thought I would see if there was another fragrance I might like. So far I have liked two and disliked one.
